that clearly communicate your message & convert visitors into clients

Get in touch

Website types & prices

Business

$750

Ecommerce

$950

Order

Simple process

1.

Contact us & tell what type of website you need, few words about your business, what design you'd like, etc.

2.

Send us some examples of websites you like.

3.

We send you to complete our short brief where you will describe your business, goals, what pages you need, etc.

4.

You send us content for your website (or we prepare it for additional fees).

5.

50% prepayment, 50% after the project is completed.

6.

Turnaround time is 10-20 business days after we receive all needed info from you.

How we work

Research & analysis

We analyze your competitors & new trends in the industry, make a research, case study, strategy.

Design & development

We create innovative responsive design that clearly communicate your message & gives the best impression of your business, develop website, add content, do onpage SEO.

Testing

We analyze site performance & improve it, check site display in various browsers & systems.

Training &support

We train you how to add content & update your website yourself, saving you time & money.

Maintenance

We can host your website, update it with fresh content, provide tech support.

Additional services & prices

Domain & web hosting

Website updating

$40 / page

Content writing

$50 / 1000 words

SEO

$40 / DA20+ guest post

Let's discuss your project

(serious inquiries only, please)
